definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Zep 1:8 raiment, attire;—abs. 2Ki 10:22 + 2 t.; sf. [[מַלְבּוּשֵׁח]] Ez Eze 16:3; pl. sf. [[מַלְבּוּשַׁי]] Is 63:3; [[מַלְבּוּשִׁיהֶם]] 2Ch 9:4, 2Ch 9:4, [[מַלְבֻּשֵׁיהֶם]] 1Ki 10:5; —raiment, 2Ki 10:22 (for worshippers, ‖[[לְבוּשׁ]]), Job 27:16 (as wealth); of Jerus. under fig. of infant Ez Eze 16:13; [[נׇכְרִי]] ´[[מַל]] Zep 1:8 foreign attire (acc. with [[לָבַשׁ]]); pl. of garments of Sol.'s servants 1Ki 10:5 = 2Ch 9:4 a, + 2Ch 9:4 b; of ´[[י]] under fig. of warrior Is 63:3.
